name: computer
msg: Floob enjoyed browsing the web and playing minesweeper.
Floob's neopet died! They're heartbroken!

name: football
msg: Floob had a fun time playing with the football.
Floob lost.

name: book
msg: Floob learnt a lot of useful information.
Floob found the book boring.

name: your car keys
msg: Floob went on a hella epic joyride!!! While Floob had a good time, your car's seen better days...
That was a little tikes toy car. Floob was not impressed.

name: plushie
msg: The plushie was very cute and cuddly!
Floob is too old for plushies.

name: film
msg: Five stars!!! Floob has resigned as a film critic because they believe this is the final film that humanity needed. They had this to say: "".
One star. The plot twists were more like knots.

name: CD
msg: Floob enjoyed the music that was on the CD.
OH GOD https://youtu.be/rOC9d17vASc

name: a bottle of mysterious pills you found somewhere in the bathroom cupboard
msg: They were calpol pills! All of Floob's medical problems are now solved.
What the hell??? They were pain-pills!! Floob's in agony!!

name: sponge
msg: The sponge was fun to play with!
Floob didn't like the sponge very much

name: skamtebord
msg: Cool and epic tricks were performed by Floob
Floob was not gnarly enough to pull off the skamteboard.

name: hot water bottle
msg: The warm sensation the water bottle gave made Floob comfortable.
Floob was all sweaty and steamy after using the water bottle. They didnt like it.

name: painted PSP
msg: Floob enjoyed the games such as Super Pok√© Brothers
Floob experienced way too much D-Pad drift.

name: dumbbell
msg: GAINS!!!
All pain, but still no gain.

name: fan
msg: Floob enjoyed the fresh breeze the fan provided!
Floob got a papercut!

name: grand piano
msg: Floob loved playing the piano!
Floob didnt like the piano. It was too hard to play without arms.

name: bong
msg: Floob got hella shonked.
Floob had a bad trip.

name: cow
msg: Moo :)
What the hell??? Floob is speciesist!!
